ai-implementation.name: AI Implementation
ai-implementation.description: Frameworks for deploying, integrating, and scaling AI capabilities within organizations. From rapid prototyping to enterprise-wide transformation.
ai-implementation.key_question: How do you systematically implement AI in your organization?

ai-governance.name: AI Governance
ai-governance.description: Frameworks for responsible AI deployment including ethics, compliance, risk management, and regulatory alignment. Essential for enterprises and regulated industries.
ai-governance.key_question: How do you govern AI responsibly while maintaining innovation speed?

ai-strategy.name: AI Strategy
ai-strategy.description: Frameworks for strategic thinking about AI investments, use case prioritization, and portfolio management across the organization.
ai-strategy.key_question: How do you prioritize which AI opportunities to pursue?

crisis-management.name: Crisis Management
crisis-management.description: Frameworks for rapid response during organizational crises, integrating stabilization with strategic transformation under time pressure.
crisis-management.key_question: How do you maintain strategic thinking during a crisis?

framework-thinking.name: Framework Thinking
framework-thinking.description: Meta-frameworks about systematic thinking itself. Learn to build frameworks, understand framework architecture, and develop framework generation capability.
framework-thinking.key_question: How do you think systematically about any problem?
